Reviews.Content: parents stayed ago told located san pietro piazza cavour piazza walked lot close staff greatalso gluten free food am celiac suffers gluten intolerance gf nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location for exploring the city centre”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryMark42
Reviews.Content: comfortable quiet air conditioning effective despite hot humid weather facilities couple nights tour flight meals breakfast buffet style excellent meals elsewhere location crowded city bus parking poor excellent base walking liked location comfort

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money in a quiet part of bustling rome.”
Reviews.Author: JoBugger
Reviews.Content: middle road hotel stay 3 nights pay 2 offer pay advance location hotel situated busy streets short walk piazza del popolo via del corso close vatican block busses 45 blocks subway wouldnt recommend using subway termini stairs walk suitcases taxi airport train termini taxibus termini hotel service hotel staff average bad helpful told check inout quick bathroom clean basic frills expected bed comfortable hours rest breakfast included rate speak cereals croissants eggs etc quick meal pasta pizza lunch overall decent money frills

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Location”
Reviews.Author: ChrisAkabusi
Reviews.Content: echo comments hotel location visit major attractions rome including probably furthest walked didnt public transport hotel friendly clean decent sized offers decent buffet breakfast set day whilst roof top terrace drink food quality highly recommended price location quality struggle rome

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel with Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Marleee
Reviews.Content: nice clean hotel nicely decorated staff helpful questions suggestions location walked bus stop blocks clean shower pay wifi 5 euros 30 minutes dont connection ground floor bar patio pretty relaxing spent time wine taxi ride airport 45 euros termini 10 euros

Reviews.Title: “Best stay for a city trip”
Reviews.Author: UnViajeDentroMexico
Reviews.Content: recommend hotel city trip central vatican historic center able watch single sight foot close hotel totally clean entrance bright comfortable receptionists speak lot languages eg english spanish italian german nice breakfest buffett comparisson italian breakfast hotel worthwhile stay doing city trip

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Rach1832
Reviews.Content: recently returned 5 night stay visconti palace hotel rome share views experience prospective hotel whilst hotel isnt prettiest outside modern clean pleasant inside reception smart bar outside patio star roof top terrace stylish modern views top fantastic chairs comfortable enjoy al fresco dinning desire ate terrace evening throughly enjoyed private dinning experience initially customers hour class service excellent food value money stayed reasonable size massive bed extremely comfortable air conditioning welcome effective keeping perfectly cool hotel cool times welcome heat day breakfast excellent vast array options buffet liked literally fill day desired location hotel exactly described website vatican nearby attractions 10 mins piazza novona 1015 mins leisurely walk found easy navigate round city hotel helpfully maps available reception definately recomend hotel travelling rome quality hotel consider value money partner definately stay visit beautiful city rome

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Great Value”
Reviews.Author: tomuchofagoodthing
Reviews.Content: weve returned 4 night stay visconti palace look forward returning visit rome picked hotel based trip advisor reviews werent disappointed hotel modern clean friendly staff travelling family 5 children 14 emailing request advance bedrooms modern beds comfortable bathrooms wasnt issue buffet breakfast choice children hotel ideally located quiet street easy walking distance central attractions piazza navona 15 mins piazza del popolo 10 mins st peters vatican highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great value + great location”
Reviews.Author: re67
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nites rome holiday welcome luxury heat villa aircon worth money equipped bath request bath shower breakfast fantastic italy bit noise neighbours nite managed sleep

Reviews.Title: “Nice Modern Hotel Close to Major Sites”
Reviews.Author: godawgsfah
Reviews.Content: visconti palace hotel hotel 3 city vacation italy situated easy walking distance major attractions central rome walked vatican coliseum forum pantheon spanish steps trevi fountain sites 30 hotel decent sized comfortable beds somewhat bathrooms air conditioning strong rooftop bar nice day travel dining nearby okay write home breakfast provided eggs meats lots fresh fruits business pleasure hotel moderncontemporary european atmosphere home base close excellent choice

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel,friendly staff,great location”
Reviews.Author: HalifaxCasper
Reviews.Content: returned visconti palace visisted rome 3times prior definetly 4 stayed inthe hotels location nicer tourist busy ares surrounding major major sites walking distancethe piazzo navona approx 15 min walk terrace top hotel lovley food highly recommended staff pleasant helpful transfer arranged hotel excellent returning romethe hotel excellent comfy beds

Reviews.Title: “Very Comfortable Hotel in a Nice Quiet Location - But Still Close Enough Everything”
Reviews.Author: NapesandLisa
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay visconti palace hotel majority staff pleasant relatively helpful standard comfortable comfortable beds breakfast excellent selection offer including soya milk opinion hotel ideally placed explore major attractions rome short walk stay visconti

Reviews.Title: “Just 4 Star”

Reviews.Content: hotel located short walk bridge food shopping local air conditioning june 1 getting hot april air lot complaints hot night lot tours stop hotel breakfsat average italians attitude dont questions staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Well maintained modern hotel, Quiet location, Short walk from main attractions”
Reviews.Author: DaveandLauren
Reviews.Content: fantastic quiet location situated main hustle city 10 minute walk main tourist attractions rome vatican piazza navona pantheon partner stayed visconti palace 3 nights april thoroughly enjoyed stay hotel staff friendly including hotel car driver airport clean mod cons expect hotel continental breakfast catered tastes disappointment beds little firm tired cramming sightseeing short trip didnt notice overall hotel stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: PaulDAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: knowing advance hotel prices rome expensive chose hotel location short walk st peters vatican piazza navona piazza del etc stayed rome times prefer location immediate access shopping food usual attractions rome major benefit shopping immediate via cola di rienzo run tourists via del corso checked upgraded suite 7th floor honeymoon 5 mins bottle food delivered compliments management staff breakfast buffet excellent spotlessly clean bed comfortable terrace 7th floor seen rome gladly pay amount extra stay hotel save 50 euros night stay substandard hotels city notice complain attitude suspect havent rome understand city achieve actually easy stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Superb freindly hotel for a good nights sleep”
Reviews.Author: Lise81
Reviews.Content: hi 28 girls day vacation rome loved visconti palace various reasons staff polite except favourite roberto received service questions willingly lot stupid questions secondly barstaff superfriendly normally dont stay hotel drink late night nearby time hotel bar third immaculate thick curtains sleep complete thick windows sound traffic plenty clean white towls bathroom filled soaps etc hair drier bit slow major hotel close walking distance vatican piazza navona pantheon etc didnt public transport truly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Perfetto!”
Reviews.Author: MY30
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel friend mine stay staff nice helpful reception received help staff called roberto smiling helped whatever stupid question answered politely recommended restaurants meal restaurants recommended called cesare food service service sitting hotel bar location bad 10 minutes walk piazza navona enjoyed stay hotel thanks nice staff wil definitely

Reviews.Title: “Good, but not as great as we expected!”
Reviews.Author: tlf82lab
Reviews.Content: picked hotel based reviews overall visconti palace pretty near previous reviews read hotel modern clean lobbylounge inviting enjoy nice glass wine night spacious european standards clean modern wasnt overly attractive bed basically twin beds joined feet ground little warm bad night slept window woken times due noise trash pickup etc nights chose sleep window closed probably combination mentioned sleep night breakfast pretty hot items husband found breakfast front desk staff particularly friendly greet simple hello bothering sometimes questions werent buy train tickets dinner reservation location goes wasnt bad wasnt lot walking tired afternoon hotel day wasnt easy pretty close piazza navona piazza del popolo overall id recommend hotel youre looking prime location

Reviews.Title: “Visconti is NOT a Palace”
Reviews.Author: AsiaWise
Reviews.Content: froma 3 night stay easter weekend rome visconti palace wasnt choice terms picking hotel organised trip 10 days hotels identified choices eventually ta help picked visconti pros location ok enjoy walking weather location fine hotel clean clean fairly modern attractive modern likeable modern cons breakfast terrible report ok cafes near workaround found staff unhelpful rude apart guy front desk main unhelpful air conditioning switched peak summer windows 2 inches april hot reported daily genuinely affect sleep awake noise outside window heat fo personally manager staff helpful matter simply told air conditioning hotel hot explain feature advertised feature duped checking wasnt available third final night eventually found fan requested daily controls broken buttons missing fan controls couldnt set liked summary air con breakfast overhauled 4 star hotel contender course customer service courses management staff wouldnt miss definitley rome hopefully visconti palace

Reviews.Title: “Clean and modern and a pleasure to stay there”
Reviews.Author: TwigsOxford
Reviews.Content: spent nights visconti palace hotel pleased choice nice huge spotlessly clean arrival bed bed comfortable breakfast fine hot food selection fruit cereals yoghurts cold meat cheese cakes bread jams etc help self juice coffee hotel situated shops restaurants nearby easy access close castel st vatican bridge piazza de poppolo walked didnt public transport restaurant liked alle due hundred yards hotel choose hotel rome

Reviews.Title: “Very close to the action, but in a peacefull location.”
Reviews.Author: NickandNess
Reviews.Content: stayed visconti april 2009 written review recommended travel agent looked reviews trip advisor scored booked location perfect days site seeing walk tiber leave hustle bustle enjoy quiet location earned rest morning bridge 10mins youre spanish steps hotel staff lovely breakfast lovely size bathroom clean range extras feel upmarket stayed partners birthday loved perfect base explore rome

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: millomite
Reviews.Content: stayed rome hotel ago expectations hoping hotel modern clean comfortable staff exceptionally helpful bar lovely sit enjoy glass wine snacks provide drinks varied tasty location perfect walking city little traffic noise night unlike inner city hotels surrounding streets numerous little restaurants cafes recommended chinese restaurant near hotel hang avoided poor service poor food expensive don’t calling themselves pizzerias pizzas menu piazza cavour worth visit friendly staff stocked draft beers finally don’t allow waiter decide wine happened expensive restaurant stick choice
